name: Antagonize Comrades
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Any number of creatures you choose within a 30 foot radius centered on target point within range you can see must succeed on an Intuition saving throw. On a failure, they are infuriated. Any creature that moves within reach of a target immediately and forcibly provokes a response attack for 0 AP. Affected creatures making a response attack take 2d10 psychic damage each time they do so.

While you are concentrating on this spell, you can use 1 AP to force an affected creature to move up to their movement speed towards any other creature.
